column1: muhammad-zafar-iqbal-91657594,Muhammad Zafar,Iqbal,A senior new business development & marketing professional.,,,personal,ACoAABQEWeIB7CFyzl-g907p-atll-d1FpO9Lac,335829474,,"A senior sales & marketing professional and entrepreneur with extensive experience

in the development and marketing of IT, financial products and customer services; with a knack for identifying new business opportunities, building new business relationships and developing business opportunities within existing client base, in the UAE, Europe and Pakistan  with a strong focus on customer service.

My long-term experience in the service industry has taught me how to meet and exceed each customer's expectations with service that sells. I have assisted all types of customers in all types of settings
I have successfully Completed “SAP” Sales and Distribution training in March 2015.

Habib Bank Limited', 'description': 'Manager Call Center (February 2013 - November 2013)
Moved into the position to transition the customer services of the bank and extend the current call center operations by establishing new call centers in Oman and Bahrain. 
Evaluated and implemented IVR system for UAE call center to improve the account enquiries and thereby customer satisfaction of the clients.
	

Manager Marketing Home Remittances & Wage Payment System (July 2011 - January 2013)
Developed and managed pricing and marketing strategy for Wage Payment System (WPS) and exceeded business targets for the product. 
Managed all marketing and business development aspects of HBL’s Home remittances product and increased the profits by 20% within six months.

Head of Special Projects, (April 09 –July 2011)
Designed Mobile Remittance System enabling unbanked customers to have access to banking and financial services through their mobile sets both in UAE and Pakistan. The solution mainly focuses on home remittances through which the banked and unbanked customers can send their home remittances.
Designed and Implemented call center for UAE. Analyzed different “IVR” based Call Center solution vendors globally and chose the company with maximum installations and cost effective solution with zero compromise on quality and service.
	
Business Development Manager, UAE (Nov 08 - Mar 09)
Managed the entire sales process from cold calling to account opening and account management focusing on individual, small and medium businesses.
Reviewed the commercial remittance business and after analyzing the market developed a Commercial remittance product competitive in the market.', 'title': 'Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Cesaps Pvt Ltd', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Lahore, Pakistan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'company': 'Cesaps Pvt Ltd', 'description': 'Chief Executive Officer
